presentationColumns.name: Current Ratio
presentationColumns.description: This metric is computed as follows : Current Assets / Current Liabilities.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Current Ratio in Analytics Currency

presentationColumns.name: Quick Ratio
presentationColumns.description: This metric is computed as follows : (Cash + AR Amount + Prepaid Expenses + Deferred Cost of Goods Sold+ Other Current Assets) / Current Liabilities.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Quick Ratio in Analytics Currency

presentationColumns.name: Debt To Equity
presentationColumns.description: This metric is computed as follows : Total Liabilities / Total Shareholders Funds Where: Total Liabilities = Current Liabilities + Long Term Liabilities
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Debt To Equity in Analytics Currency

presentationColumns.name: Capex Ratio
presentationColumns.description: This metric is computed as follows : Operating Cash Flow / CAPEX. Where: Operating Cash Flow = Net Income + Depreciation Expenses - Inventories - Accounts Receivable + Accounts Payable + Accrued Liabilities + Other Current Liabilities - Prepaid Expenses - Other Current Assets
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Capex Ratio in Analytics Currency

presentationColumns.name: CAPEX
presentationColumns.description: Activities for a period range for financial category for property, plant, and equipment (PPE).
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Incr (Decr) in PPE in Analytics Currency

presentationColumns.name: Days Cash in Hand
presentationColumns.description: This metric is computed as follows : Cash / (Daily Total Operating Expenses - Daily Depreciation Expenses). Where: Daily Total Operating Expenses = Total Operating Expenses / Number of Days from beginning day to till date of the fiscal year. Daily Depreciation Expenses = Depreciation Expenses / Number of Days from beginning day to till date of the fiscal year.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Days Cash in Hand in Analytics Currency

presentationColumns.name: NWC to Assets
presentationColumns.description: This metric is computed as follows : (Current Assets - Current Liabilities) / Total Assets.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.NWC to Assets in Analytics Currency

presentationColumns.name: Times Interest Earned
presentationColumns.description: This metric is computed as follows : EBIT YTD / Interest Expense.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Times Interest Earned in Analytics Currency

presentationColumns.name: EBIT YTD
presentationColumns.description: This metric is computed as follows : Revenue YTD - Cost of Revenue YTD - Sales & Marketing Expenses YTD - Other Operating Expenses YTD - R&D Expenses YTD - Depreciation Expenses YTD.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.EBIT YTD in Analytics Currency

presentationColumns.name: Interest Expense YTD
presentationColumns.description: Activities for Year To Date for the INT EXP financial category.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Interest Expense in Analytics Currency
